Package nl.tudelft.jpacman.board

Class Board

  • java.lang.Object
    • nl.tudelft.jpacman.board.Board
  • public class Board
extends Object
    A top-down view of a matrix of Squares.
    Author:
    Jeroen Roosen

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      int getHeight()
      Returns the number of rows.
      int getWidth()
      Returns the number of columns.
      protected boolean invariant()
      Whatever happens, the squares on the board can't be null.
      Square squareAt​(int x, int y)
      Returns the square at the given x,y position.
      boolean withinBorders​(int x, int y)
      Determines whether the given x,y position is on this board.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • invariant

        protected final boolean invariant()
        Whatever happens, the squares on the board can't be null.
        Returns:
        false if any square on the board is null.

      • getWidth

        public int getWidth()
        Returns the number of columns.
        Returns:
        The width of this board.

      • getHeight

        public int getHeight()
        Returns the number of rows.
        Returns:
        The height of this board.

      • squareAt

        public Square squareAt​(int x,
                       int y)
        Returns the square at the given x,y position. Precondition: The (x, y) coordinates are within the width and height of the board.
        Parameters:
        x - The x position (column) of the requested square.
        y - The y position (row) of the requested square.
        Returns:
        The square at the given x,y position (never null).

      • withinBorders

        public boolean withinBorders​(int x,
                             int y)
        Determines whether the given x,y position is on this board.
        Parameters:
        x - The x position (row) to test.
        y - The y position (column) to test.
        Returns:
        true iff the position is on this board.
